WorkItem.ClosedComment: This is a known issue in Word for Mac. A fix is documented in the FAQ: https://bibword.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Styles_FAQ&referringTitle=Documentation#Q2
WorkItem.Description: Thank you for this. I have a problem though. I downloaded and installed the bibliography styles then I did a in text citation and selected the Vancouver style, all of the styles I just added where there to choose from. Then I selected insert/document elements/bibliography to create a bibliography list at the end of the document. The elements gallery appears and then i am asked to confirm the citation style in a drop down menu on the left side of document. In the drop down menu none of the citation style I added from this download are there only the 4 default styles. Would please happen to know of a solution for this? It would be most appreciated. Thank you Andrewï»¿
WorkItem.Summary: new citation styles added to intext section only not when creating bibliography
